name: Space Garden (Frivolimous)
description:
This is an idle game and a work in progress.  It's kind of a wacky concept, using Force Directed Graph mechanics to build abstract plant-like conglomerates that float in outer space.  But hey it might work!

Right now I'm interested in feedback on the following:

  • Is the game intuitive enough without direct instructions?
  • Is the concept interesting?
  • Is the gameplay engaging enough as a 'phase one' or does it need more?

Thank you!

Additional Controls:

WASD to pan the screen

+ / - to zoom in and out

spacebar to pause (though why you'd want to IDK!)
